greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum over all partitions lambda of n of binomial(|lambda|, |{lambda}|).
comment: |lambda| is the number of parts in lambda and |{lambda}| is the number of distinct parts.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, p, d) option remember; `if`(n=0, binomial(p, d),
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 18 2020
